00030 
00036 /* Screw modifier: revolves the edges about an axis */
00037 
00038 #include "DNA_meshdata_types.h"
00039 #include "DNA_object_types.h"
00040 
00041 #include "BLI_math.h"
00042 #include "BLI_utildefines.h"
00043 
00044 
00045 #include "BKE_cdderivedmesh.h"
00046 
00047 #include "depsgraph_private.h"
00048 #include "MOD_modifiertypes.h"
00049 #include "MEM_guardedalloc.h"
00050 
00051 /* used for gathering edge connectivity */
00052 typedef struct ScrewVertConnect {
00053     float dist;  /* distance from the center axis */
00054     float co[3]; /* loaction relative to the transformed axis */
00055     float no[3]; /* calc normal of the vertex */
00056     int v[2]; /* 2  verts on either side of this one */
00057     MEdge *e[2]; /* edges on either side, a bit of a waste since each edge ref's 2 edges */
00058     char flag;
00059 } ScrewVertConnect;
00060 
00061 typedef struct ScrewVertIter {
00062     ScrewVertConnect * v_array;
00063     ScrewVertConnect * v_poin;
00064     int v;
00065     int v_other;
00066     MEdge *e;
00067 } ScrewVertIter;
00068 
00069 
00070 static void screwvert_iter_init(ScrewVertIter *iter, ScrewVertConnect *array, int v_init, int dir)
00071 {
00072     iter->v_array = array;
00073     iter->v = v_init;
00074 
00075     if (v_init >= 0) {
00076         iter->v_poin = &array[v_init];
00077         iter->v_other = iter->v_poin->v[dir];
00078         iter->e = iter->v_poin->e[!dir];
00079     }
00080     else {
00081         iter->v_poin= NULL;
00082         iter->e= NULL;
00083     }
00084 }   
00085 
00086 
00087 static void screwvert_iter_step(ScrewVertIter *iter)
00088 {
00089     if (iter->v_poin->v[0] == iter->v_other) {
00090         iter->v_other= iter->v;
00091         iter->v= iter->v_poin->v[1];
00092     }
00093     else if (iter->v_poin->v[1] == iter->v_other) {
00094         iter->v_other= iter->v;
00095         iter->v= iter->v_poin->v[0];
00096     }
00097     if (iter->v >= 0)   {
00098         iter->v_poin= &iter->v_array[iter->v];
00099         iter->e= iter->v_poin->e[(iter->v_poin->e[0] == iter->e)];
00100     }
00101     else {
00102         iter->e= NULL;
00103         iter->v_poin= NULL;
00104     }
00105 }
00106 
00107 
00108 static void initData(ModifierData *md)
00109 {
00110     ScrewModifierData *ltmd= (ScrewModifierData*) md;
00111     ltmd->ob_axis= NULL;
00112     ltmd->angle= M_PI * 2.0;
00113     ltmd->axis= 2;
00114     ltmd->flag= 0;
00115     ltmd->steps= 16;
00116     ltmd->render_steps= 16;
00117     ltmd->iter= 1;
00118 }
00119 
00120 static void copyData(ModifierData *md, ModifierData *target)
00121 {
00122     ScrewModifierData *sltmd= (ScrewModifierData*) md;
00123     ScrewModifierData *tltmd= (ScrewModifierData*) target;
00124     
00125     tltmd->ob_axis= sltmd->ob_axis;
00126     tltmd->angle= sltmd->angle;
00127     tltmd->axis= sltmd->axis;
00128     tltmd->flag= sltmd->flag;
00129     tltmd->steps= sltmd->steps;
00130     tltmd->render_steps= sltmd->render_steps;
00131     tltmd->screw_ofs= sltmd->screw_ofs;
00132     tltmd->iter= sltmd->iter;
00133 }
00134 
00135 static DerivedMesh *applyModifier(ModifierData *md, Object *ob,
00136                         DerivedMesh *derivedData,
00137                         int useRenderParams,
00138                         int UNUSED(isFinalCalc))
00139 {
00140     DerivedMesh *dm= derivedData;
00141     DerivedMesh *result;
00142     ScrewModifierData *ltmd= (ScrewModifierData*) md;
00143     
00144     int *origindex;
00145     int mpoly_index=0;
00146     int step;
00147     int i, j;
00148     unsigned int i1, i2;
00149     int step_tot= useRenderParams ? ltmd->render_steps : ltmd->steps;
00150     const int do_flip = ltmd->flag & MOD_SCREW_NORMAL_FLIP ? 1 : 0;
00151     int maxVerts=0, maxEdges=0, maxPolys=0;
00152     const unsigned int totvert= dm->getNumVerts(dm);
00153     const unsigned int totedge= dm->getNumEdges(dm);
00154 
00155     char axis_char= 'X', close;
00156     float angle= ltmd->angle;
00157     float screw_ofs= ltmd->screw_ofs;
00158     float axis_vec[3]= {0.0f, 0.0f, 0.0f};
00159     float tmp_vec1[3], tmp_vec2[3]; 
00160     float mat3[3][3];
00161     float mtx_tx[4][4]; /* transform the coords by an object relative to this objects transformation */
00162     float mtx_tx_inv[4][4]; /* inverted */
00163     float mtx_tmp_a[4][4];
00164     
00165     int vc_tot_linked= 0;
00166     short other_axis_1, other_axis_2;
00167     float *tmpf1, *tmpf2;
00168 
00169     int edge_offset;
00170     
00171     MPoly *mpoly_new, *mp_new;
00172     MLoop *mloop_new, *ml_new;
00173     MEdge *medge_orig, *med_orig, *med_new, *med_new_firstloop, *medge_new;
00174     MVert *mvert_new, *mvert_orig, *mv_orig, *mv_new, *mv_new_base;
00175 
00176     ScrewVertConnect *vc, *vc_tmp, *vert_connect= NULL;
00177 
00178     /* don't do anything? */
00179     if (!totvert)
00180         return CDDM_from_template(dm, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0);
00181 
00182     switch(ltmd->axis) {
00183     case 0:
00184         other_axis_1=1;
00185         other_axis_2=2;
00186         break;
00187     case 1:
00188         other_axis_1=0;
00189         other_axis_2=2;
00190         break;
00191     default: /* 2, use default to quiet warnings */
00192         other_axis_1=0;
00193         other_axis_2=1;
00194         break;
00195     }
00196 
00197     axis_vec[ltmd->axis]= 1.0f;
00198 
00199     if (ltmd->ob_axis) {
00200         /* calc the matrix relative to the axis object */
00201         invert_m4_m4(mtx_tmp_a, ob->obmat);
00202         copy_m4_m4(mtx_tx_inv, ltmd->ob_axis->obmat);
00203         mult_m4_m4m4(mtx_tx, mtx_tmp_a, mtx_tx_inv);
00204 
00205         /* calc the axis vec */
00206         mul_mat3_m4_v3(mtx_tx, axis_vec); /* only rotation component */
00207         normalize_v3(axis_vec);
00208 
00209         /* screw */
00210         if (ltmd->flag & MOD_SCREW_OBJECT_OFFSET) {
00211             /* find the offset along this axis relative to this objects matrix */
00212             float totlen = len_v3(mtx_tx[3]);
00213 
00214             if (totlen != 0.0f) {
00215                 float zero[3]={0.0f, 0.0f, 0.0f};
00216                 float cp[3];                
00217                 screw_ofs= closest_to_line_v3(cp, mtx_tx[3], zero, axis_vec);
00218             }
00219             else {
00220                 screw_ofs= 0.0f;
00221             }
00222         }
00223 
00224         /* angle */
00225 
00226 #if 0   // cant incluide this, not predictable enough, though quite fun,.
00227         if (ltmd->flag & MOD_SCREW_OBJECT_ANGLE) {
00228             float mtx3_tx[3][3];
00229             copy_m3_m4(mtx3_tx, mtx_tx);
00230 
00231             float vec[3] = {0,1,0};
00232             float cross1[3];
00233             float cross2[3];
00234             cross_v3_v3v3(cross1, vec, axis_vec);
00235 
00236             mul_v3_m3v3(cross2, mtx3_tx, cross1);
00237             {
00238                 float c1[3];
00239                 float c2[3];
00240                 float axis_tmp[3];
00241 
00242                 cross_v3_v3v3(c1, cross2, axis_vec);
00243                 cross_v3_v3v3(c2, axis_vec, c1);
00244 
00245 
00246                 angle= angle_v3v3(cross1, c2);
00247 
00248                 cross_v3_v3v3(axis_tmp, cross1, c2);
00249                 normalize_v3(axis_tmp);
00250 
00251                 if (len_v3v3(axis_tmp, axis_vec) > 1.0f)
00252                     angle= -angle;
00253 
00254             }
00255         }
00256 #endif
00257     }
00258     else {
00259         /* exis char is used by i_rotate*/
00260         axis_char += ltmd->axis; /* 'X' + axis */
00261 
00262         /* useful to be able to use the axis vec in some cases still */
00263         zero_v3(axis_vec);
00264         axis_vec[ltmd->axis]= 1.0f;
00265     }
00266 
00267     /* apply the multiplier */
00268     angle *= ltmd->iter;
00269     screw_ofs *= ltmd->iter;
00270 
00271     /* multiplying the steps is a bit tricky, this works best */
00272     step_tot = ((step_tot + 1) * ltmd->iter) - (ltmd->iter - 1);
00273 
00274     /* will the screw be closed?
00275      * Note! smaller then FLT_EPSILON*100 gives problems with float precision so its never closed. */
00276     if (fabsf(screw_ofs) <= (FLT_EPSILON*100.0f) && fabsf(fabsf(angle) - ((float)M_PI * 2.0f)) <= (FLT_EPSILON*100.0f)) {
00277         close= 1;
00278         step_tot--;
00279         if (step_tot < 3) step_tot= 3;
00280     
00281         maxVerts =  totvert  * step_tot; /* -1 because we're joining back up */
00282         maxEdges =  (totvert * step_tot) + /* these are the edges between new verts */
00283                     (totedge * step_tot); /* -1 because vert edges join */
00284         maxPolys =  totedge * step_tot;
00285 
00286         screw_ofs= 0.0f;
00287     }
00288     else {
00289         close= 0;
00290         if (step_tot < 3) step_tot= 3;
00291 
00292         maxVerts =  totvert  * step_tot; /* -1 because we're joining back up */
00293         maxEdges =  (totvert * (step_tot-1)) + /* these are the edges between new verts */
00294                     (totedge * step_tot); /* -1 because vert edges join */
00295         maxPolys =  totedge * (step_tot-1);
00296     }
00297     
00298     result= CDDM_from_template(dm, maxVerts, maxEdges, 0, maxPolys * 4, maxPolys);
00299     
00300     /* copy verts from mesh */
00301     mvert_orig =    dm->getVertArray(dm);
00302     medge_orig =    dm->getEdgeArray(dm);
00303     
00304     mvert_new =     result->getVertArray(result);
00305     mpoly_new =     result->getPolyArray(result);
00306     mloop_new =     result->getLoopArray(result);
00307     medge_new =     result->getEdgeArray(result);
00308 
00309     if (!CustomData_has_layer(&result->polyData, CD_ORIGINDEX)) {
00310         CustomData_add_layer(&result->polyData, CD_ORIGINDEX, CD_CALLOC, NULL, maxPolys);
00311     }
00312 
00313 #if 0 // trunk
00314     origindex = result->getPolyDataArray(result, CD_ORIGINDEX);
00315 #else // bmesh
00316     origindex = CustomData_get_layer(&result->polyData, CD_ORIGINDEX);
00317 #endif
00318 
00319     DM_copy_vert_data(dm, result, 0, 0, totvert); /* copy first otherwise this overwrites our own vertex normals */
00320     
00321     /* Set the locations of the first set of verts */
00322     
00323     mv_new= mvert_new;
00324     mv_orig= mvert_orig;
00325     
00326     /* Copy the first set of edges */
00327     med_orig= medge_orig;
00328     med_new= medge_new;
00329     for (i=0; i < totedge; i++, med_orig++, med_new++) {
00330         med_new->v1= med_orig->v1;
00331         med_new->v2= med_orig->v2;
00332         med_new->crease= med_orig->crease;
00333         med_new->flag= med_orig->flag &  ~ME_LOOSEEDGE;
00334     }
00335     
00336     if (ltmd->flag & MOD_SCREW_NORMAL_CALC) {
00337         /*
00338          * Normal Calculation (for face flipping)
00339          * Sort edge verts for correct face flipping
00340          * NOT REALLY NEEDED but face flipping is nice.
00341          *
00342          * */
00343 
00344 
00345         /* Notice!
00346          *
00347          * Since we are only ordering the edges here it can avoid mallocing the
00348          * extra space by abusing the vert array before its filled with new verts.
00349          * The new array for vert_connect must be at least sizeof(ScrewVertConnect) * totvert
00350          * and the size of our resulting meshes array is sizeof(MVert) * totvert * 3
00351          * so its safe to use the second 2 thrids of MVert the array for vert_connect,
00352          * just make sure ScrewVertConnect struct is no more then twice as big as MVert,
00353          * at the moment there is no chance of that being a problem,
00354          * unless MVert becomes half its current size.
00355          *
00356          * once the edges are ordered, vert_connect is not needed and it can be used for verts
00357          *
00358          * This makes the modifier faster with one less alloc.
00359          */
00360 
00361         vert_connect= MEM_mallocN(sizeof(ScrewVertConnect) * totvert, "ScrewVertConnect");
00362         //vert_connect= (ScrewVertConnect *) &medge_new[totvert]; /* skip the first slice of verts */
00363         vc= vert_connect;
00364 
00365         /* Copy Vert Locations */
00366         /* - We can do this in a later loop - only do here if no normal calc */
00367         if (!totedge) {
00368             for (i=0; i < totvert; i++, mv_orig++, mv_new++) {
00369                 copy_v3_v3(mv_new->co, mv_orig->co);
00370                 normalize_v3_v3(vc->no, mv_new->co); /* no edges- this is really a dummy normal */
00371             }
00372         }
00373         else {
00374             /*printf("\n\n\n\n\nStarting Modifier\n");*/
00375             /* set edge users */
00376             med_new= medge_new;
00377             mv_new= mvert_new;
00378 
00379             if (ltmd->ob_axis) {
00380                 /*mtx_tx is initialized early on */
00381                 for (i=0; i < totvert; i++, mv_new++, mv_orig++, vc++) {
00382                     vc->co[0]= mv_new->co[0]= mv_orig->co[0];
00383                     vc->co[1]= mv_new->co[1]= mv_orig->co[1];
00384                     vc->co[2]= mv_new->co[2]= mv_orig->co[2];
00385 
00386                     vc->flag= 0;
00387                     vc->e[0]= vc->e[1]= NULL;
00388                     vc->v[0]= vc->v[1]= -1;
00389 
00390                     mul_m4_v3(mtx_tx, vc->co);
00391                     /* length in 2d, don't sqrt because this is only for comparison */
00392                     vc->dist =  vc->co[other_axis_1]*vc->co[other_axis_1] +
00393                                 vc->co[other_axis_2]*vc->co[other_axis_2];
00394 
00395                     /* printf("location %f %f %f -- %f\n", vc->co[0], vc->co[1], vc->co[2], vc->dist);*/
00396                 }
00397             }
00398             else {
00399                 for (i=0; i < totvert; i++, mv_new++, mv_orig++, vc++) {
00400                     vc->co[0]= mv_new->co[0]= mv_orig->co[0];
00401                     vc->co[1]= mv_new->co[1]= mv_orig->co[1];
00402                     vc->co[2]= mv_new->co[2]= mv_orig->co[2];
00403 
00404                     vc->flag= 0;
00405                     vc->e[0]= vc->e[1]= NULL;
00406                     vc->v[0]= vc->v[1]= -1;
00407 
00408                     /* length in 2d, don't sqrt because this is only for comparison */
00409                     vc->dist =  vc->co[other_axis_1]*vc->co[other_axis_1] +
00410                                 vc->co[other_axis_2]*vc->co[other_axis_2];
00411 
00412                     /* printf("location %f %f %f -- %f\n", vc->co[0], vc->co[1], vc->co[2], vc->dist);*/
00413                 }
00414             }
00415 
00416             /* this loop builds connectivity info for verts */
00417             for (i=0; i<totedge; i++, med_new++) {
00418                 vc= &vert_connect[med_new->v1];
00419 
00420                 if (vc->v[0] == -1) { /* unused */
00421                     vc->v[0]= med_new->v2;
00422                     vc->e[0]= med_new;
00423                 }
00424                 else if (vc->v[1] == -1) {
00425                     vc->v[1]= med_new->v2;
00426                     vc->e[1]= med_new;
00427                 }
00428                 else {
00429                     vc->v[0]= vc->v[1]= -2; /* erro value  - don't use, 3 edges on vert */
00430                 }
00431 
00432                 vc= &vert_connect[med_new->v2];
00433 
00434                 /* same as above but swap v1/2 */
00435                 if (vc->v[0] == -1) { /* unused */
00436                     vc->v[0]= med_new->v1;
00437                     vc->e[0]= med_new;
00438                 }
00439                 else if (vc->v[1] == -1) {
00440                     vc->v[1]= med_new->v1;
00441                     vc->e[1]= med_new;
00442                 }
00443                 else {
00444                     vc->v[0]= vc->v[1]= -2; /* erro value  - don't use, 3 edges on vert */
00445                 }
00446             }
00447 
00448             /* find the first vert */
00449             vc= vert_connect;
00450             for (i=0; i < totvert; i++, vc++) {
00451                 /* Now do search for connected verts, order all edges and flip them
00452                  * so resulting faces are flipped the right way */
00453                 vc_tot_linked= 0; /* count the number of linked verts for this loop */
00454                 if (vc->flag == 0) {
00455                     int v_best=-1, ed_loop_closed=0; /* vert and vert new */
00456                     ScrewVertIter lt_iter;
00457                     int ed_loop_flip= 0; /* compiler complains if not initialized, but it should be initialized below */
00458                     float fl= -1.0f;
00459 
00460                     /*printf("Loop on connected vert: %i\n", i);*/
00461 
00462                     for (j=0; j<2; j++) {
00463                         /*printf("\tSide: %i\n", j);*/
00464                         screwvert_iter_init(&lt_iter, vert_connect, i, j);
00465                         if (j == 1) {
00466                             screwvert_iter_step(&lt_iter);
00467                         }
00468                         while (lt_iter.v_poin) {
00469                             /*printf("\t\tVERT: %i\n", lt_iter.v);*/
00470                             if (lt_iter.v_poin->flag) {
00471                                 /*printf("\t\t\tBreaking Found end\n");*/
00472                                 //endpoints[0]= endpoints[1]= -1;
00473                                 ed_loop_closed= 1; /* circle */
00474                                 break;
00475                             }
00476                             lt_iter.v_poin->flag= 1;
00477                             vc_tot_linked++;
00478                             /*printf("Testing 2 floats %f : %f\n", fl, lt_iter.v_poin->dist);*/
00479                             if (fl <= lt_iter.v_poin->dist) {
00480                                 fl= lt_iter.v_poin->dist;
00481                                 v_best= lt_iter.v;
00482                                 /*printf("\t\t\tVERT BEST: %i\n", v_best);*/
00483                             }
00484                             screwvert_iter_step(&lt_iter);
00485                             if (!lt_iter.v_poin) {
00486                                 /*printf("\t\t\tFound End Also Num %i\n", j);*/
00487                                 /*endpoints[j]= lt_iter.v_other;*/ /* other is still valid */
00488                                 break;
00489                             }
00490                         }
00491                     }
00492 
00493                     /* now we have a collection of used edges. flip their edges the right way*/
00494                     /*if (v_best != -1) - */
00495 
00496                     /*printf("Done Looking - vc_tot_linked: %i\n", vc_tot_linked);*/
00497 
00498                     if (vc_tot_linked>1) {
00499                         float vf_1, vf_2, vf_best;
00500 
00501                         vc_tmp= &vert_connect[v_best];
00502 
00503                         tmpf1= vert_connect[vc_tmp->v[0]].co;
00504                         tmpf2= vert_connect[vc_tmp->v[1]].co;
00505 
00506 
00507                         /* edge connects on each side! */
00508                         if ((vc_tmp->v[0] > -1) && (vc_tmp->v[1] > -1)) {
00509                             /*printf("Verts on each side (%i %i)\n", vc_tmp->v[0], vc_tmp->v[1]);*/
00510                             /* find out which is higher */
00511 
00512                             vf_1= tmpf1[ltmd->axis];
00513                             vf_2= tmpf2[ltmd->axis];
00514                             vf_best= vc_tmp->co[ltmd->axis];
00515 
00516                             if (vf_1 < vf_best && vf_best < vf_2) {
00517                                 ed_loop_flip= 0;
00518                             }
00519                             else if (vf_1 > vf_best && vf_best > vf_2) {
00520                                 ed_loop_flip= 1;
00521                             }
00522                             else {
00523                                 /* not so simple to work out which edge is higher */
00524                                 sub_v3_v3v3(tmp_vec1, tmpf1, vc_tmp->co);
00525                                 sub_v3_v3v3(tmp_vec2, tmpf2, vc_tmp->co);
00526                                 normalize_v3(tmp_vec1);
00527                                 normalize_v3(tmp_vec2);
00528 
00529                                 if (tmp_vec1[ltmd->axis] < tmp_vec2[ltmd->axis]) {
00530                                     ed_loop_flip= 1;
00531                                 }
00532                                 else {
00533                                     ed_loop_flip= 0;
00534                                 }
00535                             }
00536                         }
00537                         else if (vc_tmp->v[0] >= 0) { /*vertex only connected on 1 side */
00538                             /*printf("Verts on ONE side (%i %i)\n", vc_tmp->v[0], vc_tmp->v[1]);*/
00539                             if (tmpf1[ltmd->axis] < vc_tmp->co[ltmd->axis]) { /* best is above */
00540                                 ed_loop_flip= 1;
00541                             }
00542                             else { /* best is below or even... in even case we cant know whet  to do. */
00543                                 ed_loop_flip= 0;
00544                             }
00545 
00546                         }
00547 #if 0
00548                         else {
00549                             printf("No Connected ___\n");
00550                         }
00551 #endif
00552 
00553                         /*printf("flip direction %i\n", ed_loop_flip);*/
00554 
00555 
00556                         /* switch the flip option if set
00557                          * note: flip is now done at face level so copying vgroup slizes is easier */
00558 #if 0
00559                         if (do_flip)
00560                             ed_loop_flip= !ed_loop_flip;
00561 #endif
00562 
00563                         if (angle < 0.0f)
00564                             ed_loop_flip= !ed_loop_flip;
00565 
00566                         /* if its closed, we only need 1 loop */
00567                         for (j=ed_loop_closed; j<2; j++) {
00568                             /*printf("Ordering Side J %i\n", j);*/
00569 
00570                             screwvert_iter_init(&lt_iter, vert_connect, v_best, j);
00571                             /*printf("\n\nStarting - Loop\n");*/
00572                             lt_iter.v_poin->flag= 1; /* so a non loop will traverse the other side */
00573 
00574 
00575                             /* If this is the vert off the best vert and
00576                              * the best vert has 2 edges connected too it
00577                              * then swap the flip direction */
00578                             if (j == 1 && (vc_tmp->v[0] > -1) && (vc_tmp->v[1] > -1))
00579                                 ed_loop_flip= !ed_loop_flip;
00580 
00581                             while (lt_iter.v_poin && lt_iter.v_poin->flag != 2) {
00582                                 /*printf("\tOrdering Vert V %i\n", lt_iter.v);*/
00583 
00584                                 lt_iter.v_poin->flag= 2;
00585                                 if (lt_iter.e) {
00586                                     if (lt_iter.v == lt_iter.e->v1) {
00587                                         if (ed_loop_flip == 0) {
00588                                             /*printf("\t\t\tFlipping 0\n");*/
00589                                             SWAP(unsigned int, lt_iter.e->v1, lt_iter.e->v2);
00590                                         }
00591                                         /* else {
00592                                             printf("\t\t\tFlipping Not 0\n");
00593                                         }*/
00594                                     }
00595                                     else if (lt_iter.v == lt_iter.e->v2) {
00596                                         if (ed_loop_flip == 1) {
00597                                             /*printf("\t\t\tFlipping 1\n");*/
00598                                             SWAP(unsigned int, lt_iter.e->v1, lt_iter.e->v2);
00599                                         }
00600                                         /* else {
00601                                             printf("\t\t\tFlipping Not 1\n");
00602                                         }*/
00603                                     }
00604                                     /* else {
00605                                         printf("\t\tIncorrect edge topology");
00606                                     }*/
00607                                 }
00608                                 /* else {
00609                                     printf("\t\tNo Edge at this point\n");
00610                                 }*/
00611                                 screwvert_iter_step(&lt_iter);
00612                             }
00613                         }
00614                     }
00615                 }
00616 
00617                 /* *VERTEX NORMALS*
00618                  * we know the surrounding edges are ordered correctly now
00619                  * so its safe to create vertex normals.
00620                  *
00621                  * calculate vertex normals that can be propagated on lathing
00622                  * use edge connectivity work this out */
00623                 if (vc->v[0] >= 0) {
00624                     if (vc->v[1] >= 0) {
00625                         /* 2 edges connedted */
00626                         /* make 2 connecting vert locations relative to the middle vert */
00627                         sub_v3_v3v3(tmp_vec1, mvert_new[vc->v[0]].co, mvert_new[i].co);
00628                         sub_v3_v3v3(tmp_vec2, mvert_new[vc->v[1]].co, mvert_new[i].co);
00629                         /* normalize so both edges have the same influence, no matter their length */
00630                         normalize_v3(tmp_vec1);
00631                         normalize_v3(tmp_vec2);
00632 
00633                         /* vc_no_tmp1 - this line is the average direction of both connecting edges
00634                          *
00635                          * Use the edge order to make the subtraction, flip the normal the right way
00636                          * edge should be there but check just in case... */
00637                         if (vc->e && vc->e[0]->v1 == i) {
00638                             sub_v3_v3(tmp_vec1, tmp_vec2);
00639                         }
00640                         else {
00641                             sub_v3_v3v3(tmp_vec1, tmp_vec2, tmp_vec1);
00642                         }
00643                     }
00644                     else {
00645                         /* only 1 edge connected - same as above except
00646                          * don't need to average edge direction */
00647                         if (vc->e && vc->e[0]->v2 == i) {
00648                             sub_v3_v3v3(tmp_vec1, mvert_new[i].co, mvert_new[vc->v[0]].co);
00649                         }
00650                         else {
00651                             sub_v3_v3v3(tmp_vec1, mvert_new[vc->v[0]].co, mvert_new[i].co);
00652                         }
00653                     }
00654 
00655                     /* vc_no_tmp2 - is a line 90d from the pivot to the vec
00656                      * This is used so the resulting normal points directly away from the middle */
00657                     cross_v3_v3v3(tmp_vec2, axis_vec, vc->co);
00658 
00659                     /* edge average vector and right angle to the pivot make the normal */
00660                     cross_v3_v3v3(vc->no, tmp_vec1, tmp_vec2);
00661 
00662                 }
00663                 else {
00664                     copy_v3_v3(vc->no, vc->co);
00665                 }
00666 
00667                 /* we wont be looping on this data again so copy normals here */
00668                 if (angle < 0.0f)
00669                     negate_v3(vc->no);
00670 
00671                 normalize_v3(vc->no);
00672                 normal_float_to_short_v3(mvert_new[i].no, vc->no);
00673 
00674                 /* Done with normals */
00675             }
00676         }
00677     }
00678     else {
00679         mv_orig= mvert_orig;
00680         mv_new= mvert_new;
00681 
00682         for (i=0; i < totvert; i++, mv_new++, mv_orig++) {
00683             copy_v3_v3(mv_new->co, mv_orig->co);
00684         }
00685     }
00686     /* done with edge connectivity based normal flipping */
00687     
00688     /* Add Faces */
00689     for (step=1; step < step_tot; step++) {
00690         const int varray_stride= totvert * step;
00691         float step_angle;
00692         float nor_tx[3];
00693         float mat[4][4];
00694         /* Rotation Matrix */
00695         step_angle= (angle / (step_tot - (!close))) * step;
00696 
00697         if (ltmd->ob_axis) {
00698             axis_angle_to_mat3(mat3, axis_vec, step_angle);
00699             copy_m4_m3(mat, mat3);
00700         }
00701         else {
00702             unit_m4(mat);
00703             rotate_m4(mat, axis_char, step_angle);
00704             copy_m3_m4(mat3, mat);
00705         }
00706 
00707         if (screw_ofs)
00708             madd_v3_v3fl(mat[3], axis_vec, screw_ofs * ((float)step / (float)(step_tot-1)));
00709 
00710         /* copy a slice */
00711         DM_copy_vert_data(dm, result, 0, varray_stride, totvert);
00712         
00713         mv_new_base= mvert_new;
00714         mv_new= &mvert_new[varray_stride]; /* advance to the next slice */
00715         
00716         for (j=0; j<totvert; j++, mv_new_base++, mv_new++) {
00717             /* set normal */
00718             if (vert_connect) {
00719                 mul_v3_m3v3(nor_tx, mat3, vert_connect[j].no);
00720 
00721                 /* set the normal now its transformed */
00722                 normal_float_to_short_v3(mv_new->no, nor_tx);
00723             }
00724             
00725             /* set location */
00726             copy_v3_v3(mv_new->co, mv_new_base->co);
00727             
00728             /* only need to set these if using non cleared memory */
00729             /*mv_new->mat_nr= mv_new->flag= 0;*/
00730                 
00731             if (ltmd->ob_axis) {
00732                 sub_v3_v3(mv_new->co, mtx_tx[3]);
00733 
00734                 mul_m4_v3(mat, mv_new->co);
00735 
00736                 add_v3_v3(mv_new->co, mtx_tx[3]);
00737             }
00738             else {
00739                 mul_m4_v3(mat, mv_new->co);
00740             }
00741             
00742             /* add the new edge */
00743             med_new->v1= varray_stride + j;
00744             med_new->v2= med_new->v1 - totvert;
00745             med_new->flag= ME_EDGEDRAW|ME_EDGERENDER;
00746             med_new++;
00747         }
00748     }
00749 
00750     /* we can avoid if using vert alloc trick */
00751     if (vert_connect) {
00752         MEM_freeN(vert_connect);
00753         vert_connect= NULL;
00754     }
00755 
00756     if (close) {
00757         /* last loop of edges, previous loop dosnt account for the last set of edges */
00758         const int varray_stride= (step_tot - 1) * totvert;
00759 
00760         for (i=0; i<totvert; i++) {
00761             med_new->v1= i;
00762             med_new->v2= varray_stride + i;
00763             med_new->flag= ME_EDGEDRAW|ME_EDGERENDER;
00764             med_new++;
00765         }
00766     }
00767     
00768     mp_new= mpoly_new;
00769     ml_new= mloop_new;
00770     med_new_firstloop= medge_new;
00771     
00772     /* more of an offset in this case */
00773     edge_offset = totedge + (totvert * (step_tot - (close ? 0 : 1)));
00774 
00775     for (i=0; i < totedge; i++, med_new_firstloop++) {
00776         /* for each edge, make a cylinder of quads */
00777         i1= med_new_firstloop->v1;
00778         i2= med_new_firstloop->v2;
00779 
00780         for (step=0; step < step_tot-1; step++) {
00781             
00782             /* new face */
00783             if (do_flip) {
00784                 ml_new[3].v = i1;
00785                 ml_new[2].v = i2;
00786                 ml_new[1].v = i2 + totvert;
00787                 ml_new[0].v = i1 + totvert;
00788 
00789                 ml_new[2].e = step == 0 ? i : (edge_offset + step + (i * (step_tot - 1))) - 1;
00790                 ml_new[1].e = totedge + i2;
00791                 ml_new[0].e = edge_offset + step + (i * (step_tot - 1));
00792                 ml_new[3].e = totedge + i1;
00793             }
00794             else {
00795                 ml_new[0].v = i1;
00796                 ml_new[1].v = i2;
00797                 ml_new[2].v = i2 + totvert;
00798                 ml_new[3].v = i1 + totvert;
00799 
00800                 ml_new[0].e = step == 0 ? i : (edge_offset + step + (i * (step_tot - 1))) - 1;
00801                 ml_new[1].e = totedge + i2;
00802                 ml_new[2].e = edge_offset + step + (i * (step_tot - 1));
00803                 ml_new[3].e = totedge + i1;
00804             }
00805 
00806 
00807             mp_new->loopstart = mpoly_index * 4;
00808             mp_new->totloop = 4;
00809             mp_new->flag= ME_SMOOTH;
00810             origindex[mpoly_index]= ORIGINDEX_NONE;
00811             mp_new++;
00812             ml_new += 4;
00813             mpoly_index++;
00814             
00815             /* new vertical edge */
00816             if (step) { /* The first set is already dome */
00817                 med_new->v1= i1;
00818                 med_new->v2= i2;
00819                 med_new->flag= med_new_firstloop->flag;
00820                 med_new->crease= med_new_firstloop->crease;
00821                 med_new++;
00822             }
00823             i1 += totvert;
00824             i2 += totvert;
00825         }
00826         
00827         /* close the loop*/
00828         if (close) { 
00829             if (do_flip) {
00830                 ml_new[3].v = i1;
00831                 ml_new[2].v = i2;
00832                 ml_new[1].v = med_new_firstloop->v2;
00833                 ml_new[0].v = med_new_firstloop->v1;
00834 
00835                 ml_new[2].e = (edge_offset + step + (i * (step_tot - 1))) - 1;
00836                 ml_new[1].e = totedge + i2;
00837                 ml_new[0].e = i;
00838                 ml_new[3].e = totedge + i1;
00839             }
00840             else {
00841                 ml_new[0].v = i1;
00842                 ml_new[1].v = i2;
00843                 ml_new[2].v = med_new_firstloop->v2;
00844                 ml_new[3].v = med_new_firstloop->v1;
00845 
00846                 ml_new[0].e = (edge_offset + step + (i * (step_tot - 1))) - 1;
00847                 ml_new[1].e = totedge + i2;
00848                 ml_new[2].e = i;
00849                 ml_new[3].e = totedge + i1;
00850             }
00851 
00852             mp_new->loopstart = mpoly_index * 4;
00853             mp_new->totloop = 4;
00854             mp_new->flag= ME_SMOOTH;
00855             origindex[mpoly_index]= ORIGINDEX_NONE;
00856             mp_new++;
00857             ml_new += 4;
00858             mpoly_index++;
00859         }
00860         
00861         /* new vertical edge */
00862         med_new->v1= i1;
00863         med_new->v2= i2;
00864         med_new->flag= med_new_firstloop->flag & ~ME_LOOSEEDGE;
00865         med_new->crease= med_new_firstloop->crease;
00866         med_new++;
00867     }
00868 
00869     /* validate loop edges */
00870 #if 0
00871     {
00872         i = 0;
00873         printf("\n");
00874         for ( ; i < maxPolys * 4; i += 4) {
00875             int ii;
00876             ml_new = mloop_new + i;
00877             ii = findEd(medge_new, maxEdges, ml_new[0].v, ml_new[1].v);
00878             printf("%d %d -- ", ii, ml_new[0].e);
00879             ml_new[0].e = ii;
00880 
00881             ii = findEd(medge_new, maxEdges, ml_new[1].v, ml_new[2].v);
00882             printf("%d %d -- ", ii, ml_new[1].e);
00883             ml_new[1].e = ii;
00884 
00885             ii = findEd(medge_new, maxEdges, ml_new[2].v, ml_new[3].v);
00886             printf("%d %d -- ", ii, ml_new[2].e);
00887             ml_new[2].e = ii;
00888 
00889             ii = findEd(medge_new, maxEdges, ml_new[3].v, ml_new[0].v);
00890             printf("%d %d\n", ii, ml_new[3].e);
00891             ml_new[3].e = ii;
00892 
00893         }
00894     }
00895 #endif
00896 
00897     if ((ltmd->flag & MOD_SCREW_NORMAL_CALC) == 0) {
00898         /* BMESH_TODO, we only need to get vertex normals here, this is way overkill */
00899         CDDM_calc_normals(result);
00900     }
00901 
00902     return result;
00903 }
00904 
00905 
00906 static void updateDepgraph(ModifierData *md, DagForest *forest,
00907                         struct Scene *UNUSED(scene),
00908                         Object *UNUSED(ob),
00909                         DagNode *obNode)
00910 {
00911     ScrewModifierData *ltmd= (ScrewModifierData*) md;
00912 
00913     if (ltmd->ob_axis) {
00914         DagNode *curNode= dag_get_node(forest, ltmd->ob_axis);
00915 
00916         dag_add_relation(forest, curNode, obNode,
00917                          DAG_RL_DATA_DATA | DAG_RL_OB_DATA,
00918                          "Screw Modifier");
00919     }
00920 }
00921 
00922 static void foreachObjectLink(
00923                 ModifierData *md, Object *ob,
00924                 void (*walk)(void *userData, Object *ob, Object **obpoin),
00925                 void *userData)
00926 {
00927     ScrewModifierData *ltmd= (ScrewModifierData*) md;
00928 
00929     walk(userData, ob, &ltmd->ob_axis);
00930 }
00931 
00932 /* This dosnt work with material*/
00933 static DerivedMesh *applyModifierEM(
00934                         ModifierData *md,
00935                         Object *ob,
00936                         struct BMEditMesh *UNUSED(editData),
00937                         DerivedMesh *derivedData)
00938 {
00939     return applyModifier(md, ob, derivedData, 0, 1);
00940 }

00942 static int dependsOnTime(ModifierData *UNUSED(md))
00943 {
00944     return 0;
00945 }

00948 ModifierTypeInfo modifierType_Screw = {
00949     /* name */              "Screw",
00950     /* structName */        "ScrewModifierData",
00951     /* structSize */        sizeof(ScrewModifierData),
00952     /* type */              eModifierTypeType_Constructive,
00953 
00954     /* flags */             eModifierTypeFlag_AcceptsMesh
00955                             | eModifierTypeFlag_AcceptsCVs
00956                             | eModifierTypeFlag_SupportsEditmode
00957                             | eModifierTypeFlag_EnableInEditmode,
00958 
00959     /* copyData */          copyData,
00960     /* deformVerts */       NULL,
00961     /* deformMatrices */    NULL,
00962     /* deformVertsEM */     NULL,
00963     /* deformMatricesEM */  NULL,
00964     /* applyModifier */     applyModifier,
00965     /* applyModifierEM */   applyModifierEM,
00966     /* initData */          initData,
00967     /* requiredDataMask */  NULL,
00968     /* freeData */          NULL,
00969     /* isDisabled */        NULL,
00970     /* updateDepgraph */    updateDepgraph,
00971     /* dependsOnTime */     dependsOnTime,
00972     /* dependsOnNormals */  NULL,
00973     /* foreachObjectLink */ foreachObjectLink,
